meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Campbell Warner Maire Kennedy Justin Nigro Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6877.

td.p: Campbell Warner, a military attorney originally from Rock Hill, South Carolina
Maire Kennedy, an adventure specialist from Santa Rosa, California
Justin Nigro, a coalition director originally from Ashtabula, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $5,599)

tr.td: 2 TERMS MAKE A NEW BAND NAME
POLITICS
SHAKESPEAREAN ACTORS
GOOD TRY!
FATHERLY NICKNAMES
CONSONANT-FREE STATE CAPITALS
(Alex: You have to add the consonants in order to come up with the correct response.)

tr.td: A public exhibition of cowboy skills like calf roping plus the burial ceremony for a person

Maire
Campbell
LITERARY CLERGYMEN
SOME "BUT"s ABOUT IT
LOOKING FOR LOVE ON REALITY TV
OH, LOOK AT THE TIME
HERE'S YOUR HAT
